page.title: 10VENN QUARRY
page.content:
Mrs. Spear took us around Venn Quarry in her car. We discovered how big the quarry was; we hadn't realised before how large it was but we soon found out. Around the area there were lots of farms and very few private houses. We weren't able to go into the quarry because the men were at work and it would have been too dangerous. On the way back we stopeed at Mrs. Spear's farm and had a drink before returning to school.
David Pettett Darren Evans Martin Foley Alex Spear Alan Chapman
Bishops Tawton Primary School
